config package

Submodules

config.constants module

This module contains program constants. Including EBNF, logging_config, etc.

config.constants.EBNF = '\nservice     : step_block*\nstep_block  : step_header step_body\nstep_header : "step" step_name\nstep_name   : CNAME\nstep_body   : command*\ncommand     : assign | speak | listen | branch | silence | default | end | runpy | system\nassign      : var "=" expression\nexpression  : term ("+" term)*\nterm        : var | ESCAPED_STRING\nvar         : "$" CNAME\nspeak       : "speak" expression\nlisten      : "listen" expression ["," var]\nbranch      : "branch" expression "," step_name\nsilence     : "silence" step_name\ndefault     : "default" step_name\nend         : "end"\nrunpy       : "runpy" expression\nsystem      : "system" expression    \n\n%import common (ESCAPED_STRING, WS, CNAME, C_COMMENT, CPP_COMMENT)\n%ignore WS\n%ignore C_COMMENT\n%ignore CPP_COMMENT\n'

EBNF grammar constants

config.constants.log_format = '[%(asctime)s %(name)s %(levelname)s] %(message)s'

logging format

config.constants.log_level = 20

logging level

config.constants.log_path = 'Yard.log'

path of log file
